author: @Thearoged
title: AMD FSR 4 will be in 35 games on the release and in 75 games until the end of the year - before the
text:
Edition
Videocardz The full list of 35 games that will receive the new FSR 4 APSR 4 APSR) at the time of the release of video cards Radeon RX 9000 or on the release of the game itself. Along with this, we shared several new details about this technology, but for now let’s take a look at the list of games:
- The Alters
- Bellwright
- Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (February 20)
- Creatures of Ava
- Dragonkin: The Banished (March 6)
- Endoria: The Last Song
- FragPunk
- Funko Fusion
- God of War: Ragnarok
- Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered
- Horizon Forbidden West
- Hunt: Showdown 1896
- Incursion Red River
- Crystals
- Marvel Rivals (February 21)
- Marvel’s Spider-Man 2
- Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered
- Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales
- MechWarrior 5: Clans
- Monster Hunter Wilds
- Nightingale
- No More Room in Hell 2
- Panicor
- Predator: Hunting Grounds
- Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
- Remnant 2
- Smite 2
- The Axis Unseen
- The Last of Us: Part I
- The Last of Us: Part II Remastered (5 апреля)
- Until Dawn
- Warhammer 40,000: Space Marines 2
- Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
- Dynasty Warriors: Origins
- Civilization 7
By the end of 2025, FSR 4 should appear in 75+ games. As for the new information, we are informed that the new version of the Apskayler may not have the “Ultra performance” mode, and the “performance” will be a minimum for him. It is also reported that the developers do not have to introduce FSR 4 into their games – enough version 3.1. Further, users if desired will be replaced through the driver 3.1 with fsr 4
